title: Prestigious LeBlanc Blue/Purple Chroma
body:
So I just played a game and I immediately noticed the change that was made with this particular Prestigious LeBlanc chroma. I knew something was off.
The ring of the hat and the outline of the dress changed from Purple to Red. I'm not sure if I have missed something like an update, but this sure is bugging me quite a bit. 

Can anyone verify if they have also noticed it? Thanks!

replies.body:
Yo! 

Thanks for the report! Imma copy paste my reply to Vonler's bug report for visibility! 

Lemme dig into this today, as I'm not sure which is the correct option. 

**EDIT:** The store asset is correct, and we're working to pop the correct texture back into the build. This is something you'll see for patch 7.7. Sorry for the bug. We figured out what happened (a file was overwritten), and we've taken steps to prevent this from occurring the future. ;_; Thanks for your patience! <3

Noticed it too and made a bug report about it.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/zfcUIEAg-gameplay-prestigious-leblanc-chroma-dark-blue

https://goo.gl/photos/aJUq9gtENgfn6YyX6 If you're able to see this, this is a screenshot that I just took from an ARAM game using the said chroma.

Edit: If that doesn't work, try this one https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipMekl2EewPLlhGMAgrvv6Tpq-NwFlEjAqMHR-xFcDNMS1VT3W49TXh5lX5J84bYWQ/photo/AF1QipMl48XIcHf6AEXcVBY9j-MAifdJP-paPld3Z_L_?key=bG1kaEdxbHM0WUNIcDEwZnNyMlRNMUd6QVB3Q2VB
